author: Tim Rogers
title: I Cannot Emotionally Prepare For Final Fantasy VII Remake - Kotaku
description: The Final Fantasy VII Remake is coming in April. I could only watch the first 30 seconds of the new trailer released today before I had to close the tab in fear. I can’t possibly become emotionally ready in time. This video represents my best, most terrible a…

author: Loren Grush
title: A Russian satellite seems to be tailing a US spy satellite in Earth orbit - The Verge
description: A Russian satellite named Kosmos 2542 has positioned itself uncomfortably close to an American spy satellite named USA 245 in orbit around Earth. It’s led space trackers to speculate that the foreign vehicle is inspecting the US spacecraft.

author: https://www.facebook.com/Storiesbywilliams-205745679447998/?ref=hl
title: This is the Spot Where ESA's Schiaparelli Crashed Into Mars - Universe Today
description: The MRO's HiRISE camera recently snapped fresh images of where the ESA's Schiaparelli lander crashed on the surface of Mars in 2016.

author: Carl Zimmer
title: Neanderthal Genes Hint at Much Earlier Human Migration From Africa - The New York Times
description: Modern humans may have left the continent as long 200,000 years ago, a new analysis suggests.

author: https://www.facebook.com/browncscott
title: Maybe Huawei should abandon official Android - Android Authority
description: Recent statements from a Huawei rep suggested the company might do this, but it isn't likely. But maybe it really is time.

author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus cases 'very likely' in Wales - BBC News
description: It is "not very surprising" that cases of the virus have reached the UK, Wales' chief doctor says.

author: Malaysiakini
title: Patient goes walkabout while being tested for coronavirus - Malaysiakini
description: CORONAVIRUS | Man who spent two days in Wuhan returns home while awaiting test results prompting hospital to lodge a report.

author: Peter
title: Samsung trademarks "Super ISO" for use with the Galaxy S20 phones - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
description: This is likely a new version of Samsung's night mode.

author: Jeanna Bryner
title: 'Life's Little Mysteries' podcast is here! We'll answer intriguing (and weird) science questions - Livescience.com

author: Malaysiakini
title: Wong Tack lambasts Lynas over PDF announcement - Malaysiakini
description: Noted critic calls on AELB to prevent Lynas from using deposit funds to finance new project.
